mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERID, EMAIL, NAME, USERNAME, SIGNUPDATE, AUTH, GITHUBID, SOCIAL FROM MEMBERS WHERE EMAIL=#{email} AND PASSWORD=hex(aes_encrypt(#{password}, 'key'))
SELECT MEMBERID, EMAIL, NAME, USERNAME, SIGNUPDATE, AUTH FROM MEMBERS WHERE DELFLAG=0 ORDER BY MEMBERID
SELECT MEMBERID, EMAIL, NAME, USERNAME, SIGNUPDATE, AUTH, GITHUBID, LOCATIONID, UNIT, SOCIAL FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberid}
mapper.delete: UPDATE MEMBERS SET DELFLAG=1 WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS(EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, USERNAME, SIGNUPDATE, SOCIAL) VALUES(#{email},hex(aes_encrypt(#{password}, 'key')),#{name},#{username},now(),#{social})
